question: 平均
sourceMnemonic: Something that's <kanji>flat</kanji> and <kanji>equal</kanji> to everything around it, all those flat things around it, are <vocabulary>average</vocabulary>. They're the <vocabulary>mean</vocabulary> (same as average).
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
